arts.ttl: Key Newcastle United trio hurt in Brentford win as Alexander Isak injury update given
arts.sum: "We hope it’s nothing too serious, but he just wasn’t feeling 100 per cent in his groin. Eddie Howe has admitted he had to withdraw Alexander Isak off due to an injury concern against Brentford.

arts.ttl: Newcastle reaction is bad news for Chelsea and what crowd did spoke volumes
arts.sum: Whatever about those huge games to come, there was certainly no danger of Howe taking Brentford lightly. Cast your mind back to the last time Newcastle qualified for the Champions League, a couple of seasons ago, and convincing victories against Spurs, West Ham, Manchester United, Everton and Brighton did not necessarily tell the full story during the run-in.

arts.ttl: Liverpool make decision on Newcastle’s Alexander Isak asking price
arts.sum: Liverpool are one of the clubs very interested in a summer move for Alexander Isak, although it will not be easy to prise him away from Newcastle, who have zero intention of letting their star striker move away from St James’ Park. Liverpool are expected to sign a new striker during the summer transfer window, […] The post Liverpool make decision on Newcastle’s Alexander Isak asking price appeared first on CaughtOffside.

arts.ttl: Eddie Howe hails Sandro Tonali’s ‘big moment’ in Newcastle’s win over Brentford
arts.sum: The 24-year-old Italy international brought an incident-packed encounter to a fitting conclusion with a 74th-minute piledriver to earn a precious win.
Eddie Howe says Newcastle were not at their best in a 2-1 victory over Brentford at St James' Park.

arts.ttl: Video: Did Tonali mean to score goal of the season contender at Newcastle?
arts.sum: Italy international Sandro Tonali went viral for scoring a goal of the season contender for...

arts.ttl: Newcastle have last laugh after Saudi taunt as chiefs see ballsy move
arts.sum: Alexander Isak opened the scoring for the Carabao Cup winners just before half-time, but Bryan Mbeumo equalised from the spot midway through the second half after Nick Pope brought Yoane Wissa down inside the box. Newcastle showed grit to find a way to open the scoring, to bounce back after Brentford's equaliser and to close the game out after eight minutes of stoppage time were added on and that is a quality the Magpies are going to need if they are to finish in the top five.

arts.ttl: Sandro Tonali's 'Hang it in the Louvre' moment could earn Newcastle United millions
arts.sum: As the game ticked by the half hour mark, Sandro Tonali's effort was blocked and Harvey Barnes flashed an effort just past Flekken's right-hand post. Having lost 4-2 to Brentford in December, Newcastle knew it wouldn't be easy and while they did breeze past the side from West London in the Carabao Cup at the end of the year, this Bees side had won three away games on the spin.

arts.ttl: Juventus consider plan for Newcastle United’s Sandro Tonali
arts.sum: Juventus seem determined to bring Sandro Tonali back to the Serie A this summer and are working towards that. The Old Lady want some new leaders and firepower in the…
